title: @FEK Event Staff
body:
So, thanks for running the tournament, it was a lot of fun. Obviously there were some hiccups along the way (though I was lucky enough to not experience any) but that's to be expected the first time you do something like this and I thin overall it went quite well. So, good job to you all and I hope to participate in more events in the future?

Also, who do I talk to about what chibi drawing I want (although it's probably obvious)?
